title: 507 51 "Reunited with Dark King Rayleigh! Decision Time for Luffy!"Transliteration: "Meiō Reirī to no Saikai – Rufi Ketsudan no Toki" (Japanese:冥王レイリーとの再会 ルフィ決断の時) Takahiro Imamura Tomohiro Nakayama July 17, 2011(2011-07-17)
transformers_text: 507 51 Reunited with Dark King Rayleigh Decision Time for Luffy Transliteration Mei Re ir to no Sai kai Ru fi Ket sudan no Toki Japanese Takahiro Imamura Tomohiro Nakayama July 17 2011 2011 07 17 On Maiden Island Rayleigh kills a Sea King and arrives on the island in front of Law's crew Meanwhile at Amazon Lily Hancock is contemplating about marriage when Jim bei and Luffy meet the Dark King who tells that Law has left the island with his crew Rayleigh gives back Luffy's straw hat and befriends Hancock and her sisters Rayleigh tells Hancock that Kuma was the one who sent Luffy to Amazon Lily just before he teleported the Straw Hat crew away However Rayleigh cannot bring Luffy back to the Saba o dy Archipelago as he would suffer the same fate on the island He gives Luffy an offer to be trained Meanwhile at the Bow in Islands an overweight Us opp desperately tries to escape and fight despite Heracles ' objections Us opp is sucked into the island's mouth but is rescued by Heracles Us opp makes a vow to Heracles that he will not abandon Luffy
tf_idf_text: reunite dark king rayleigh decision time luffy transliteration mei sai kai ket sudan toki japanese takahiro imamura tomohiro nakayama july maiden island rayleigh kill sea king arrives island front law crew meanwhile amazon lily hancock contemplate marriage jim bei luffy meet dark king tell law leave island crew rayleigh give back luffys straw hat befriend hancock sister rayleigh tell hancock kuma one sent luffy amazon lily teleport straw hat crew away however rayleigh cannot bring luffy back saba archipelago would suffer fate island give luffy offer train meanwhile bow island overweight opp desperately try escape fight despite heracles objection opp sucked island mouth rescue heracles opp make vow heracles not abandon luffy
